name: r2-uploader
title: R2 Uploader
description: Cloudflare R2 uploader, easy to use.
author: zeahoo_z

commands.name: index
commands.title: Set uploader config
commands.description: R2 Config Setting form, config your api info

commands.name: upload
commands.title: upload file
commands.description: upload file from your last clipboard

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
